pages.name: homepage
warnings: ANCHOR_API_KEY is not set. API calls will fail.

seo.title: The Anchor Pub Near Me | Heathrow's Local Pub | Open Now
seo.description: The Anchor pub in Stanwell Moor near Heathrow Airport. Traditional British pub with drag shows, tequila tastings, quiz nights & more. Dog-friendly beer garden under the flight path.

seo.title: What's On | The Anchor Stanwell Moor | Events, Entertainment & Live Music | The Anchor Stanwell Moor
seo.description: Regular events at The Anchor pub including drag shows, tequila tastings, quiz nights, live music and more. Something happening every week!

seo.title: Drag Shows | The Anchor Stanwell Moor | Saturday Night Entertainment | The Anchor Stanwell Moor
seo.description: Spectacular drag shows every Saturday at The Anchor with Nikki Manfadge. Inclusive, fun entertainment near Heathrow. Book your table for an unforgettable night!

seo.title: Tequila Tasting Events | The Anchor Stanwell Moor | Premium Mexican Spirits | The Anchor Stanwell Moor
seo.description: Join our quarterly tequila tasting events at The Anchor. Explore Mexico's finest spirits, learn about regions and production, all in a friendly social atmosphere near Heathrow.

seo.title: Food Menu | The Anchor Stanwell Moor | Traditional British Pub Food | The Anchor Stanwell Moor
seo.description: Enjoy traditional British pub food at The Anchor. Famous Sunday roasts, stone-baked pizzas, burgers, and family-friendly meals. Kitchen open Tuesday-Sunday.

seo.title: Sunday Roast | The Anchor Stanwell Moor | Best Sunday Lunch Near Heathrow | The Anchor Stanwell Moor
seo.description: Award-winning Sunday roasts at The Anchor. Traditional British roast dinners served 12-5pm every Sunday. Book early - very popular with locals and Heathrow travelers.

pages.name: drinks
warnings: ANCHOR_API_KEY is not set. API calls will fail.

seo.title: Drinks Menu | The Anchor Stanwell Moor | Real Ales & Premium Tequila | The Anchor Stanwell Moor
seo.description: Extensive drinks selection at The Anchor. Real ales, craft beers, premium tequilas, wines, and cocktails. Home of Thursday tequila tastings.

pages.name: find-us
warnings: ANCHOR_API_KEY is not set. API calls will fail.

seo.title: Find Us | The Anchor Stanwell Moor | Directions & Parking | The Anchor Stanwell Moor
seo.description: Find The Anchor pub in Stanwell Moor. Easy directions from Heathrow, M25, and local areas. Free parking available. Just off Horton Road near the church.

pages.name: book-event
warnings: ANCHOR_API_KEY is not set. API calls will fail.

seo.title: Book an Event | The Anchor Stanwell Moor | Private Parties & Functions | The Anchor Stanwell Moor
seo.description: Book The Anchor for your private event. Birthday parties, corporate events, wakes, and celebrations. Flexible spaces and custom menus available.

seo.title: Pub Near Heathrow Airport | The Anchor Stanwell Moor | 7 Minutes from All Terminals | The Anchor Stanwell Moor
seo.description: The closest traditional British pub to Heathrow Airport. Just 7 minutes from Terminal 5, 10 minutes from T2/T3. Free parking, great food, and a warm welcome for travelers.

seo.title: Pub Near Heathrow Terminal 2 | The Anchor - 10 Minutes Away | The Anchor Stanwell Moor
seo.description: Traditional British pub just 10 minutes from Heathrow Terminal 2. Free parking, great food, and perfect for Star Alliance travelers. Your pre-flight dining destination.

seo.title: Pub Near Heathrow Terminal 3 | The Anchor - 10 Minutes Away | The Anchor Stanwell Moor
seo.description: Family-friendly British pub just 10 minutes from Heathrow Terminal 3. Free parking, traditional food, perfect for Virgin Atlantic and Emirates travelers.

seo.title: Pub Near Heathrow Terminal 4 | The Anchor - 12 Minutes Away | The Anchor Stanwell Moor
